biocontainers.name: genomicconsensus
biocontainers.summary: PacBio genomic consensus and variant caller for RSII and Sequel

biotools.summary: The GenomicConsensus package provides the variantCaller tool, which allows you to apply the Quiver or Arrow algorithm to mapped PacBio reads to get consensus and variant calls.

galaxy.summary: Compute genomic consensus and call variants using PacBio reads mapped to a reference
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: The GenomicConsensus package provides the variantCaller tool, which allows you to apply the Quiver or Arrow algorithm to mapped PacBio reads to get consensus and variant calls.
